Title: Better Late Than DEAD
Genre: Action, Adventure, Indie, Early Access
Developer: Odin Game Studio 
Publisher: Merge Games, Excalibur	
Release Date: Jul 23, 2015
Store page: http://store.steampowered.com/app/352950/

About:
Explore an open sandbox environment which, depending on your intention, could have or could not have a foreseeable end. But as you investigate further, you may notice some suspicious activity including animals that would not normally be found in an area like this and some inconsistencies that lead to more questions. It is up to you to discover the answers. 
Craft items, quench your thirst, satisfy your hunger, fend off animalsÃ¢â‚¬Â¦ What will you really need to escape the island? The answers are waiting.
COMMUNITY DRIVEN
The community will help us plan what will come next! Would you like to see more items, animals or even locations to explore?
FEATURES:
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Uncover a story that unfolds with new updates 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Craft items using a combination of objects and methods like tying and cutting 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Online Multiplayer 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Lose blood, break bones, become poisoned and stave off hunger and thirst 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Varying weather conditions that affect gameplay 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Procedurally generated items that the player must find to leave the island 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Dangerous animals including wolves, snakes and bears 
Ã¢â‚¬Â¢ Permadeath Ã¢â‚¬â€œ Will you be able to escape the island or will you succumb to its menace?
DEVELOPMENT ROADMAP
The following are in development features that will be implemented within the first three months of development. We of course will expand upon this in the forums, as we will be implementing player suggestions over the next few months, but this is the minimum that we will deliver within the first three months of development. 
Sleep system 
Trap system 
Bow and arrow (combat and crafting) 
Aquatic animals, yes including sharks! 
New Items 
New crafting recipes 
More island details 
Keybinding 
Better server handling (saving, loading, optimization, etc) 
Dedicated server 
More characters visual on multiplayer 
Game story enhanced and evolved upon 
Bug fixes (This is early access after all!) 
Optimization (Very important, please help us with this!)

System Requirements
MINIMUM: 
OS: Windows 7/8 (All OS must be 64 bit) 
Processor: Intel Dual Core 2.0Ghz 
Memory: 4 GB RAM 
Graphics: Dedicated graphics with 1GB VRAM (DX9 compatible - Nvidia Geforce GTX 470/ATI Radeon 6900 series or greater) 
DirectX: Version 9.0 
Hard Drive: 2 GB available space

RECOMMENDED: 
OS: Windows 7/8 (All OS must be 64 bit) 
Processor: Intel Quad Core 2.4Ghz or above 
Memory: 8 GB RAM 
Graphics: Dedicated graphics with 1GB VRAM (DX9 compatible - Nvidia Geforce GTX 470/ATI Radeon 6900 series or greater) 
DirectX: Version 9.0 
Hard Drive: 2 GB available space
